name: istrl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wfun(ccnv(c0))))

comment: Conditions for a pair of classes/functions to be a trail (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Dec-2020.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
